backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user sessions, messages, and content types (artworks, music, games) with CRUD operations, blob storage integration, and user authentication via caller principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: replacing the Vantior AI logo with the Neroxa AI logo and updating all branding references from Vantior to Neroxa.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, and configuration, describing UI layouts, responsive design, chat interfaces, media generation, and integration patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and semantic colors using CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, PWA manifest link, and viewport configuration for Neroxa AI application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, and theme colors for Neroxa AI progressive web app installation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all web crawlers to index all pages of the application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with tab navigation for chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, and games features, including Internet Identity authentication and routing setup.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive HTML5 canvas drawing component with color palette, brush controls, eraser tool, AI idea generator chat panel, and artwork save/share functionality with URL generation.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component that displays a list of chat sessions with timestamps, allows creating new chats, and handles session selection. Uses React Query hooks to fetch and manage chat sessions.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Main chat interface component that displays messages in a conversation, handles user input with a textarea, and simulates AI responses with a typing indicator. Auto-scrolls to latest messages.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Card component for displaying game metadata (title, description, category, thumbnail) with hover effects and a play button. Shows a play overlay on hover and handles game launch.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Modal dialog component for playing games with fullscreen toggle, loading states, and error handling. Currently shows a placeholder interface for the actual game player.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Games catalogue view with search, category filtering, and pagination (24 items per page). Displays games in a grid using GameCard components and manages GamePlayer modal state.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, theme toggle (light/dark mode), and conditional sign-out button for authenticated users. Uses Internet Identity authentication hook.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: React component providing a math problem solver with multiple modes (standard, homework helper, teacher mode), supporting different difficulty levels (K-12), step-by-step solutions, and concept explanations. Includes client-side math expression evaluation and a chat-like homework helper interface.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: React component for AI-powered media generation with tabbed interface for images and videos. Allows users to generate media from text prompts and displays generated content in responsive grids.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: React component for generating music via AI prompts or creating beat patterns with a visual sequencer. Features playback controls, tempo adjustment, sharing functionality, and Web Audio API integration for beat synthesis.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: React component providing a chat-based code generation interface where users describe coding tasks and receive code snippets. Includes copy-to-clipboard functionality and a scrollable message history.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: React component for viewing shared artwork or music via unique IDs. Handles loading states, error cases, and displays shared content with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: React component that provides a translation chat interface with language selection dropdowns, text input area, translation history display, and clear history functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Custom hook that generates art idea suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food) by returning randomized creative prompts from predefined arrays.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Custom hook that handles sharing artwork by converting canvas to PNG blob, uploading to backend via ExternalBlob, generating shareable URLs, and managing share state with React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Custom hook that generates synthesized audio using Web Audio API by creating simple melodies based on prompt characteristics, converts AudioBuffer to WAV blob, and manages generated audio history.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom hook that manages canvas drawing functionality including mouse/touch event handling, brush settings (color, size), eraser mode, and canvas clearing with proper coordinate scaling.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Custom hook that manages chat sessions with backend using React Query, providing functionality to fetch sessions, add messages, create new sessions, and handle user registration.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Custom hooks that fetch game catalogue data and individual game metadata from the backend actor using React Query with proper dependency management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Hook for generating mock AI images and videos using canvas, creating placeholder media with gradient backgrounds and text overlays to simulate AI generation with delays.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Hook for sharing music files to the backend canister using ExternalBlob, with mutation handling and URL generation for shared music content.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Hook for AI-powered script generation that maintains chat history and generates mock code snippets (React, Python, JavaScript, API calls) based on user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and display shared artwork and music content from the backend canister using ExternalBlob URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Hook for text translation that maintains translation history and generates mock translations for common phrases across multiple languages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a dark theme with teal primary colors, coral accents, and sidebar styling using HSL color values.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extends theme with custom border radii, shadows, and keyframe animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the application name 'nexora ai', existing features for logo replacement and rebranding from 'Vantior AI' to 'Neroxa AI', with no current feature requests or known issues.
